var _AudioManager;// 音效管理系統
class AudioManager{constructor(){this.backgroundMusic=null;this.soundEffects=new Map();this.isEnabled=true;this.musicVolume=0.3;this.effectVolume=0.5;this.initializeAudio();}static getInstance(){if(!AudioManager.instance){AudioManager.instance=new AudioManager();}return AudioManager.instance;}initializeAudio(){// 由於我們不能使用真實的音頻文件，我們將創建音頻上下文來生成音效
this.createSyntheticBackgroundMusic();this.createSoundEffects();}createSyntheticBackgroundMusic(){// 創建一個循環的背景音樂音頻上下文
try{const audioContext=new(window.AudioContext||window.webkitAudioContext)();this.createMelody(audioContext);}catch(error){console.log('Web Audio API not supported');}}createMelody(audioContext){// 創建輕鬆愉快的旋律
const notes=[{freq:523.25,duration:0.5},// C5
{freq:587.33,duration:0.5},// D5
{freq:659.25,duration:0.5},// E5
{freq:698.46,duration:0.5},// F5
{freq:783.99,duration:0.5},// G5
{freq:659.25,duration:0.5},// E5
{freq:523.25,duration:1.0}// C5
];let currentTime=audioContext.currentTime;const playMelody=()=>{if(!this.isEnabled)return;notes.forEach((note,index)=>{const oscillator=audioContext.createOscillator();const gainNode=audioContext.createGain();oscillator.connect(gainNode);gainNode.connect(audioContext.destination);oscillator.frequency.setValueAtTime(note.freq,currentTime+index*note.duration);oscillator.type='sine';gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(0,currentTime+index*note.duration);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(this.musicVolume*0.1,currentTime+index*note.duration+0.1);gainNode.gain.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(0.001,currentTime+index*note.duration+note.duration);oscillator.start(currentTime+index*note.duration);oscillator.stop(currentTime+index*note.duration+note.duration);});currentTime+=notes.reduce((total,note)=>total+note.duration,0)+2;setTimeout(playMelody,(notes.reduce((total,note)=>total+note.duration,0)+2)*1000);};if(audioContext.state==='suspended'){audioContext.resume().then(()=>{playMelody();});}else{playMelody();}}createSoundEffects(){// 創建各種音效
this.createSoundEffect('move',[200,300,400],0.1);this.createSoundEffect('complete',[523.25,659.25,783.99],0.3);this.createSoundEffect('star1',[523.25],0.2);this.createSoundEffect('star2',[523.25,659.25],0.2);this.createSoundEffect('star3',[523.25,659.25,783.99],0.2);this.createSoundEffect('finalCelebration',[523.25,659.25,783.99,1046.5],0.5);}createSoundEffect(name,frequencies,duration){try{const audioContext=new(window.AudioContext||window.webkitAudioContext)();const playEffect=()=>{if(!this.isEnabled)return;frequencies.forEach((freq,index)=>{const oscillator=audioContext.createOscillator();const gainNode=audioContext.createGain();oscillator.connect(gainNode);gainNode.connect(audioContext.destination);oscillator.frequency.setValueAtTime(freq,audioContext.currentTime+index*0.1);oscillator.type='triangle';gainNode.gain.setValueAtTime(0,audioContext.currentTime+index*0.1);gainNode.gain.linearRampToValueAtTime(this.effectVolume*0.2,audioContext.currentTime+index*0.1+0.01);gainNode.gain.exponentialRampToValueAtTime(0.001,audioContext.currentTime+index*0.1+duration);oscillator.start(audioContext.currentTime+index*0.1);oscillator.stop(audioContext.currentTime+index*0.1+duration);});};this.soundEffects.set(name,{play:playEffect});}catch(error){console.log('Could not create sound effect:',name);}}// 公共方法
setEnabled(enabled){this.isEnabled=enabled;localStorage.setItem('audioEnabled',enabled.toString());}isAudioEnabled(){const saved=localStorage.getItem('audioEnabled');if(saved!==null){this.isEnabled=saved==='true';}return this.isEnabled;}playBackgroundMusic(){if(this.isEnabled){// 背景音樂已經在循環播放
}}stopBackgroundMusic(){// 音效會自動停止
}playSound(soundName){if(this.isEnabled&&this.soundEffects.has(soundName)){const sound=this.soundEffects.get(soundName);if(sound&&sound.play){try{sound.play();}catch(error){console.log('Could not play sound:',soundName);}}}}setMusicVolume(volume){this.musicVolume=Math.max(0,Math.min(1,volume));}setEffectVolume(volume){this.effectVolume=Math.max(0,Math.min(1,volume));}}_AudioManager=AudioManager;AudioManager.instance=void 0;export default AudioManager;
